author: wn.com
title: BCC and MasterCard to hold business workshops on growing consumer trend towards e-payments (Hertfordshire Chamber ...
text: ( Source : Hertfordshire Chamber of Commerce & Industry ) The British Chambers of Commerce ( BCC ), in partnership with MasterCard, are running a series of workshops to help more small businesses adopt card and electronic payments methods,
